description: Wondering how to make caramel sauce? This luxurious caramel sauce recipe is perfect for adding to cakes and slices. Drizzle it over ice-cream for a summer dessert.
name: Caramel Sauce Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat sugar in a non-stick frying pan over low heat, shaking pan often, for 5 minutes or until the sugar has dissolved and is dark golden. Set aside for 2 minutes or until bubbles subside.
Add cream to toffee and stir over low heat for 5 minutes or until toffee has dissolved and sauce has thickened slightly. Remove pan from heat, then whisk in butter until melted and combined.
